entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Snow level 1000 metres. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
